text: Roger Walkowiak (2 March 1927 - 6 February 2017) was a French road bicycle racer. He was a professional rider from 1950 until 1960. He won the 1956 Tour de France. He was born in Montluçon, Allier. Walkowiak died on 6 February 2017 in Vichy, Allier, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:Tour de France winners Category:People from Allier
title: Roger Walkowiak
